Trade/Device Name(s): MEG-2 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
MEG-2 Multi Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MEG-2 and MEG-2 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems and accessories for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm for self-testing by lay users and multi-patient clinical use by professionals as an aid in monitoring levels in Diabetes Mellitus; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
